articles.title: NVIDIA Chat with RTX hands-on: This local AI chatbot already shows plenty of promise - Windows Central
articles.description: NVIDIA's AI chatbot runs locally on your PC, and it works with the data you provide.
articles.content: NVIDIA does a lot of interesting things around AI, but its consumer-facing business is still predominantly focused on gaming. It's now aiming to bring both categories together with the introduction o… [+3369 chars]
